English: (My guy's behavior takes to the brain.) My guy's behavior annoys me.

Finnish: Hänellä ei ollut selkärankaa kieltäytyä lahjuksista.
English: (He didn't have the spine to turn down the bribes.) He wasn't strong enough not to accept the bribes.
Hungarian: Nem volt gerince, hogy visszautasítsa a kenőpénzt.

English: (He has the blood of a writer in his veins.) He's a born writer, is talented, has an affinity for writing.
(It doesn't fit in my skull.) I don't understand, don't believe it.
(He screamed with full lungs.) He screamed as loud as he could.
(She has the heart on its place.) She's good-hearted, she tries to do well.
